item.title: ‘The Breakfast Club’ Returning to Theaters in Celebration of 40th Anniversary (Exclusive)
item.description: Universal Pictures will rerelease John Hughes’ groundbreaking coming-of-age classic in early September.

item.title: ‘The Breakfast Club’ Returning to Theaters in Celebration of 40th Anniversary (Exclusive)
item.description: Universal Pictures will rerelease John Hughes’ groundbreaking coming-of-age classic in early September.

item.title: Pete Davidson Thinks He Might Have Been “Annoying” to ‘SNL’ Cast: “I Did Rub People the Wrong Way”
item.description: The comedian insisted no one was mean to him on the NBC show though he feared his co-stars weren’t fans of his sudden rise to fame.

item.title: Pete Davidson Thinks He Might Have Been “Annoying” to ‘SNL’ Cast: “I Did Rub People the Wrong Way”
item.description: The comedian insisted no one was mean to him on the NBC show though he feared his co-stars weren’t fans of his sudden rise to fame.
